fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: BPO1 activated on Hoodi, BPO2 scheduled next week before mainnet
Nethermind investigating Fusaka-related reorg bug discovered post-activation
Decision to proceed with Fusaka mainnet rollout on schedule

client_updates.highlight: Nethermind, Geth, Erigon, and Reth published tiered EIP rankings for Glamsterdam
Besu consensus forming around FOCIL as S-tier with 5-7 gas repricing EIPs
Nimbus emphasizes calldata repricing as critical hard blocker for scaling

organizational.highlight: Process: temperature checks today, CFI/DFI candidate lists for decisions in two weeks
FOCIL discussions will happen primarily on ACDC calls

eip_discussions.highlight: Core repricing bundle (6-7 EIPs) presented with mixed support on bundling approach
Strong support for EIP-7778 refund logic change
Strong support for EIP-8024 as low complexity, high impact
Multiple clients prefer to DFI milligas approach (EIP-8053/8059)
Strong opposition to EIP-8057 temporal locality discounts due to archive node complexity
Besu and Erigon oppose SSZ EIPs (6404, 6466); Dustin proposes subset PureETH scope
Debate on contract size: EIP-7907 immediate increase vs EIP-2926 chunk-based approach
Mixed views on post-quantum precompiles: urgency concerns vs uncertainty about standards
Trustless log index viewed as too complex for Glamsterdam by Nethermind

action_items.action: Publish Fusaka mainnet blog post (TBD for Nethermind/Prysm versions)
Publish detailed EIP rankings by next week
Synthesize client feedback into CFI/DFI candidate lists before next call
Provide info on EIP-7971 transient storage limits and AA compatibility
Take contract size strategy discussion offline

decisions.decision: Proceed with Fusaka mainnet rollout on current timeline
FOCIL discussions primarily on ACDC calls (EL devs encouraged to attend)
No final CFI/DFI decisions today - temperature checks only
Continue scoping in two weeks during DevConnect, making first CFI/DFI decisions

targets.target: BPO2 activation on Hoodi next week (final before mainnet)
Next ACDE in two weeks for first CFI/DFI decisions
